Title: Liv's Trial
TalkContent: From time to time we will establish a link with you so you can enter our M.I.N.D. Please listen to everyone's requests.
It's a good start, Commandant. Keep it up!
You're really good at this, Commandant...
The Commandant is full of surprises—
I have great faith in you. Nothing is too hard for you.

Title: Lucia's Trial
TalkContent: Sorry to disturb you. I hope it's not a bad time. I've run into some difficulties that I can't resolve by myself. Can you help?
Build on your momentum. You can do it!
You're getting better and better. There's no hurry. Take your time.
You never disappoint me, Commandant.
The Commandant really is a strong and well-adjusted human. Thank you.

Title: Lee's Trial
TalkContent: Sorry to bother you. I'm having trouble crunching some numbers. Lucia said you'd be able to help...
This part has not been completed.
It seems I underestimated you.
Wow. You ARE good.
Okay, I admit you're a very capable Commandant. Thanks for solving my problem.

Title: Kamui's Trial
TalkContent: Ah, Commandant! Just the person I was looking for. I'm having a bit of trouble with something and was wondering if you can help… Oh, come on! Pleaseee!
Keep going! Keep going! Don't stop!
Great job!
I knew asking you would be the best option!
You da' man Commandant! I'll fight twice as hard for you now!

Title: Nanami's Trial
TalkContent: Commandant, Commandant—sorry to bother you! Can you help Nanami? You're the most reliable human I know!
Wow—not half bad!
You fixed three problems in one go!
Commandant—that was AMAZING!!!
Can you be our Commandant for life?

Title: Bianca's Trial
TalkContent: Sorry to disturb you, Commandant. Can you do me a huge favor? There's some things I can't accomplish by myself.
I hope the next problem is this easy.
You never fail to amaze me.
Your reputation is well-earned.
I'm honored you included me as one of your Constructs.

Title: Karenina's Trial
TalkContent: Liv and Lucia said I should talk to you, not that I want to. I can solve these problems, I just didn't want them buzzing around me. Hmph...
I could do that, if I wanted to!
Hm... If I was just a little bit stronger, I'd definitely...
Wow, you solved them all... Okay, I admit it. You know what you're doing.
You've got to train me up, so I can be even better than Lucia!
